mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders ( user_id, total_price, status, address, address_detail, created_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{totalPrice}, #{status}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, NOW() )
INSERT INTO order_items ( order_id, product_id, quantity, price ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, #{price} )
mapper.select: SELECT order_id AS orderId, user_id AS userId, total_price AS totalPrice, status, address, address_detail AS addressDetail, created_at AS createdAt FROM orders WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT order_id AS orderId, user_id AS userId, total_price AS totalPrice, status, address, address_detail AS addressDetail, created_at AS createdAt FROM orders WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
SELECT order_item_id AS orderItemId, order_id AS orderId, product_id AS productId, quantity, price FROM order_items WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
